name: CBL2CAPChannel
desc: A live L2CAP connection to a remote device.

items.name: var inputStream: InputStream!
items.desc: The stream used for reading data from the remote peer.

items.name: var outputStream: OutputStream!
items.desc: The stream used for writing data to the peer.

items.name: var peer: CBPeer!
items.desc: The peer connected to the channel.
